languages.text: {n}Люди, рассыпавшиеся вокруг вас по площадке, взирают на вас словно на призрака. У одних в глазах плещется страх, у других — звериная ненависть, а у некоторых — надежда.{/n}
{n}The humans scattered around you on the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some betray their fear, others glare with bestial hatred, and yet more look upon you with hope.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Люди, рассыпавшиеся вокруг вас по площадке, взирают на вас словно на призрака. У одних в глазах плещется страх, у других — звериная ненависть, а у некоторых — надежда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The people scattered over the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some give away their fear, others are glaring with hatred and a few more are looking at you with hope.{/n}
{n}The people scattered over the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some give away their fear, others are glaring with hatred and a few more are looking at you with hope.{/n}
{n}The people scattered over the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some betray their fear, others glare with bestial hatred, and yet more look upon you with hope.{/n}

{n}The humans scattered around you on the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some betray their fear, others glare with bestial hatred, and yet more look upon you with hope.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ステージ上のあちこちにいる人間は、幽霊でも見るかのような視線をこちらに送る。恐怖心を滲ませる者もいれば、ひどい憎悪の眼差しを向ける者、希望を胸に見上げる者とそれぞれだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humans scattered around you on the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some betray their fear, others glare with bestial hatred, and yet more look upon you with hope.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ステージ上のあちこちにいる人間は、幽霊でも見るかのような視線をこちらに送る。恐怖心を滲ませる者もいれば、ひどい憎悪の眼差しを向ける者、希望を胸に見上げる者とそれぞれだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你身边的人类看着你，就好像见了鬼一样。有些人的眼中流露出恐惧，有些人的眼中流露出野兽般的仇恨，但更多的人目光中充满了希望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humans scattered around you on the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some betray their fear, others glare with bestial hatred, and yet more look upon you with hope.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你身边的人类看着你，就好像见了鬼一样。有些人的眼中流露出恐惧，有些人的眼中流露出野兽般的仇恨，但更多的人目光中充满了希望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les humains éparpillés sur la plateforme vous dévisagent comme s'ils voyaient un fantôme. Si certains ne peuvent dissimuler leur peur et d'autres la haine bestiale qu'ils ressentent à votre égard, d'autres semblent soudain emplis d'espoir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humans scattered around you on the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some betray their fear, others glare with bestial hatred, and yet more look upon you with hope.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les humains éparpillés sur la plateforme vous dévisagent comme s'ils voyaient un fantôme. Si certains ne peuvent dissimuler leur peur et d'autres la haine bestiale qu'ils ressentent à votre égard, d'autres semblent soudain emplis d'espoir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los humanos desperdigados por la plataforma te miran como si fueras un fantasma. Unos con miedo, otros con odio bestial y la mayoría con esperanza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humans scattered around you on the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some betray their fear, others glare with bestial hatred, and yet more look upon you with hope.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los humanos desperdigados por la plataforma te miran como si fueras un fantasma. Unos con miedo, otros con odio bestial y la mayoría con esperanza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die auf der Plattform verstreuten Menschen starren, als hätten sie einen Geist gesehen. Einigen steht die Angst ins Gesicht geschrieben, anderen animalischer Hass, wieder andere blicken dich voller Hoffnung an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humans scattered around you on the platform stare as if they've seen a ghost. The eyes of some betray their fear, others glare with bestial hatred, and yet more look upon you with hope.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die auf der Plattform verstreuten Menschen starren, als hätten sie einen Geist gesehen. Einigen steht die Angst ins Gesicht geschrieben, anderen animalischer Hass, wieder andere blicken dich voller Hoffnung an.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Platformda üzerinde etrafını saran insanlar, hayalet görmüşçesine bakışlarını sana dikiyor. Bazıları gözlerindeki korkuyu saklayamazken bazılarıysa bakışlarında canavarca bir öfke barındırıyor. Yine de birçoğu sana umutla bakıyor.{/n}
